text: The 1897–98 international cricket season was from September 1897 to April 1898. The season consists with a single international tour where AE Stoddart's XI toured Australia for The Ashes championship. ==Season overview== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="7" |International tours |- ! rowspan="2" |Start date ! rowspan="2" |Home team ! rowspan="2" |Away team ! colspan="4" |Results [Matches] |- !Test !ODI !FC !LA |- | | | |4–1 [5] |; style="text- align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |} ==References== Category:International cricket competitions by season Category:1897 in cricket Category:1898 in cricket
title: International cricket in 1897–98
